root.name: HeroClix TabApp
root.description: Using giant, super-deformed HeroClix specially developed for this game, players can play different scenarios depending on which Clix they own. The iPad version currently both DC and Marvel characters, but for now, the Android tablet version only supports DC.Current Clix compatible with this game include:Pack NameFigures IncludedX-MenIceman, Wolverine, CyclopsAvengersThor, Captain America, Iron ManThe Dark Knight RisesBatman, Catwoman, BaneDC Comics Super HeroesSuperman, Wonder Woman, Batman
